heading: Today, New Years Day
text: Early snow from VT east ending. Increasing sun west to east. Colder.
temperature: Teens to single numbers north, 20s to teen south

heading: Thursday Night
text: Mostly clear, then some clouds west. Quite cold.
temperature: Zero to 15 below north, 5 below to 5 above south

heading: Saturday
temperature: Low to mid teens north, upper teens to mid 20s south
